messages.title: FOCUS ON LONGTON SOUTH
messages.content: Your Local Candidate For Longton South: I feel very privileged to have been selected as the Liberal Democrat candidate for Longton South. It is an honour to be able to represent a area I have lived in for 20 years. I was born in Stoke-on-Trent, I was brought up and educated in the Longton South ward. I own a business locally and have been actively a part of the local community for a long span of time.

housing.content: I was brought up and educated in the Longton South ward.

leaflet.personalStatement: I feel very privileged to have been selected as the Liberal Democrat candidate for Longton South. It is an honour to be able to represent a area I have lived in for 20 years.

endorsements.endorsement: Ellis Bevan congratulates Sadaqat Maqsoom: "PROUD TO STAND WHERE I LIVE"

images.caption: Sadaqat with Stoke South parliamentary candidate Dr Zulfiqar Ali
Ellis Bevan congratulates Sadaqat Maqsoom: "PROUD TO STAND WHERE I LIVE"

leaflet.additionalNotes: You have a chance to really make a difference at this election...
